## Aggregation interface

A bucket that contains information for each filterable option (such as price, category `UID`<!-- -->, and custom attributes).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Aggregation 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribute\_code](./magento-api.aggregation.attribute_code.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | Attribute code of the aggregation group. |
|  [count?](./magento-api.aggregation.count.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The number of options in the aggregation group. |
|  [label?](./magento-api.aggregation.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The aggregation display name. |
|  [options?](./magento-api.aggregation.options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[AggregationOption](./magento-api.aggregationoption.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Array of options for the aggregation. |
